introduction: The film won Hungary's 'Documentary of the Year' Award (2009) and the 'Pál Schiffer' Directorial Award at the 39th Hungarian Film Festival.THE FILM: A never told love story from the Second World War.At the age of 86, Vera sets out to find the three missing pages, the last chapter of her tragic love story. She met Albert on the winter of 1937. It was love at first sight. But soon the war swept across Europe. This emotional documentary follows Vera, as she sets out to find three missing pages from a 60 year old book, that might have the answers to her long kept questions.
